feed.title: Password Pusher Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.51.3: Better Redirect Handling & New Environment Variable
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • Fix: Better redirect handling (#3104) @pglombardo
  • Add environment variable to disable Turbo Drive (#3101) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.1050.0 to 1.1051.0 (#3100) @dependabot[bot]

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@dependabot[bot], @pglombardo and dependabot[bot]

:motor_boat: Docker Images

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush

:running_man: Run This Version

bash docker run -d -p 5100:5100 pglombardo/pwpush:1.51.3

..and go to http://localhost:5100

:link: Useful Links

  • Documentation
  • Docker Hub
  • GitHub
  • Website
  • Twitter
  • Newsletter

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.51.5: New Login Session Timeout Config Option
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

:rocket: Features

  • New Login Session Timeout Config Option (#3118) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.1052.0 to 1.1053.0 (#3116) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump sqlite3 from 2.5.0 to 2.6.0 (#3115) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump stringio from 3.1.3 to 3.1.5 (#3114) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump zeitwerk from 2.7.1 to 2.7.2 (#3110) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-core from 3.218.1 to 3.219.0 (#3111) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-s3 from 1.181.0 to 1.182.0 (#3108) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-kms from 1.98.0 to 1.99.0 (#3107) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump nokogiri from 1.18.2 to 1.18.3 (#3106) @dependabot[bot]

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@dependabot[bot], @pglombardo and dependabot[bot]

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.51.6: Fix Passphrase, TurboDrive & Logout Button
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • Fix: Update Passphrase Cookie & TurboDrive Default Settings (#3129) @pglombardo
  • Fix: Logout Menu Item (#3119) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump rubocop-ast from 1.38.0 to 1.38.1 (#3126) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.1054.0 to 1.1055.0 (#3125) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump cssbundling-rails from 1.4.1 to 1.4.2 (#3124) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump oj from 3.16.9 to 3.16.10 (#3123) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump httpclient from 2.8.3 to 2.9.0 (#3121) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.1053.0 to 1.1054.0 (#3120) @dependabot[bot]
